lenders.name: Erika & Jeff
lenders.loan_because: We saw this on Oprah. Either way you slice it, it's a win win situation!

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: This is a tangible way to show and share the love of Christ.

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: to enable someone to put their stamp on the world

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: God is AWESOME! Loving everyone is what makes us a world of people; and this is yet another way I can say, "Thank you Lord." ...
lenders.occupational_info: I manager an apartment community of 407 apartment homes, providing customer service to over 1500 residents.

lenders.name: Paul & Pam
lenders.loan_because: Because we want to give back something for all that God has provided us.
lenders.occupational_info:
Paul directs the management of all government owned vehicles used by the employees of the State of North Dakota, USA

Pam listens to doctor summaries of patient visits and types it on a computer for permanent record keeping.

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: it is a great way to help people become self sufficient and create a way to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a management position for the US Government. It is very rewarding work

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: Much of what I do is based on acting locally and thinking globally. But once in a while, I think it is important to look at the big picture too, and Kiva satisfied a desire I have had for some time to help others, even outside my immediate realm of control. I can do without that extra icecream cone, piece of pizza or CD album. Joining Kiva is also an expresssion of my spirituality in the sense of Buddhist "right action".
lenders.occupational_info: I have a dual careers... one in the health care technology as a software developer, and another as a composer/performer. In both of those areas, technology has changed how we live and work. I like Kiva because it is another example of a great idea that really can change the world.

lenders.name: Becky
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference by helping someone reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of early childhood students, ages 4-6.

lenders.name: jamie
lenders.loan_because: i can and it makes me happy to help others

lenders.name: Narma Family
lenders.loan_because: it seems natural to help those who are willing to put in the effort to help themselves.

lenders.name: Rochelle
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be given the opportunity to fulfill their dreams regardless of location or personal circumstances.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I love the feeling that it gives to help someone out that really needs it.   I love being able to help change someone's life for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: My work consist of working in a doctor's office,  I got into this kind of work because I wanted to be able to help someone that really needs someone to help them get through their situation, such as a illness.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: This is the best way to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to people who have recently come to America.

lenders.occupational_info:
love my grandchildren as much as possible and be a good example.
be enthusiastic about our product.

lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part to help end poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I support companies with the "human" side of business.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I was one of the many people who saw on Oprah what one person can do to make a difference in someone else's life.  Someone who just needs a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Newborn Intensive Care, taking care of premature and sick newborn babies.

lenders.name: Brolin
lenders.loan_because: I saw this site on Oprah and it seemed like a really nice and unique idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student at college studying television broadcast, which is everything that is involved in the production of television shows.

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: Healthcare, nursing.

lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: Just a little effort from us can make a huge difference for somebody else

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their goals and improve their lives.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: It feels like a gift to myself.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: The same reason everybody here does -once you realize it takes so little to change a life it's pretty hard not to lend.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company promotes and sells travel around the world

lenders.name: Bruno
lenders.loan_because: I think It's important to help people
lenders.occupational_info: Giving love through my photos !

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because:
To see a world in a grain of sand,
And a heaven in a wild flower,
Hold infinity in the palm of your hand,
And eternity in an hour - William Blake  You can make a difference in someones life and future.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the director of a charitable foundation that makes grants to strengthen communities.

lenders.name: Son
lenders.loan_because: I believe very strongly in philanthropy. It's bigger than me and you.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: This is the way I can express my awe at those who work so hard to change the lives of themselves, their families and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with large business leaders helping them figure out the best way to manage and develop their employees

lenders.name: krista
lenders.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur myself and I know how difficult it is to get your own business up and running. I want to "pay forward" the generosity that was given to me to start my own business. I have the upmost respect for each and every individual who has the ambition to make their own path in life by starting their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I help small to medium sized companies build their business by creating logos, websites and marketing materials to promote their company and products.

lenders.name: Henrik
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is the best way to help others be succesful. The succes will be longer lasting and more impactful if they can create opportunities for themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I help develop oil and gas in a responsible so we can continue the growth and betterment of the world

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I like empowering people to improve their circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: Account Development for a Print Solutions Company

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the life of someone who needs a helping hand. God has been very generous to me and my husband and I feel it my honor and privilege to "Pay it Forward".
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people of all ages about the nature and wildlife of Michigan, USA. Through guided nature hikes and live animal programs, I try to get the general public to care about our planet, its natural resources, and the diversity of habitats. Working together, we can make a difference in the one home we all share - planet Earth.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: Just as you excel in everything-in faith,in speech,in knowledge, in complete earnestness and in your love for us,see that you also exceed in this grace of giving- 2 Cor 8:7

lenders.name: Rebekah
lenders.loan_because: Just as you excel in everything-in faith,in speech,in knowledge, in complete earnestness and in your love for us,see that you also exceed in this grace of giving- 2 Cor 8:7
lenders.occupational_info: Prepare, Compound and Dispense medication to patients.  Counsel them on the diseases and the medications to treat.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: It makes a person able to help themselves.  There is pride and dignity in helping yourself.
lenders.occupational_info: I know the rewards of being able to take care of my expenses in life.  My business allows me to do that.  I want to help someone else know success... so they can in turn help others.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: As a struggling small business owner I know how hard it can be. And as hard as it can be here, it must be immensely difficult in other places in the world. Compared to most, we have a lot, a home, cars, TV, and security. But mostly I give because my parents raised me with the sense of obligation to those less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I use computers to create art for businesses. Things like logos, business cards, menus, and flyers. I try and make companies look good. I also design websites, and some database management.

lenders.name: Michelle & Two Guys
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good.  Like Oprah and Mr. Clinton said giving is a selfish act.  This is one time that I do not mind being selfish.
lenders.occupational_info: Some think I am crazy because I teach middle school (ages 12-13).

lenders.name: Miskeeto
lenders.loan_because: Micro-lending is a brilliant way to help citizens from all over the world reach their potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I figure out how products need to work so that people can use them effectively.

lenders.occupational_info: I develop different type of parts and tools for robots which are used in the bodywork construction - mainly for the big european car producers

lenders.name: Amanda

lenders.occupational_info: I am a sales assistant in a company that sells camping memberships to our camping/RV parks nationwide.

lenders.name: Sabrina
lenders.loan_because: I care about people.

lenders.name: Mike & Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: We're blessed with the ability to do so.

lenders.loan_because: I am grateful.

i worked very hard all my life. 
as you are i am sure. i have the good furtune to live in a country that has opportunity. it discourages me to see young people in my country taking so much for granted. and then see how hard it is for others in undeveloped society's. i hope my little contribution helps.

Mary helps children at school.

lenders.name: DEBBIE
lenders.loan_because: THE WORLD HAS MANY PLACES THAT ARE NOT AS LUCKY AS WE ARE IN AMERICA. WE ARE BLESSED TO BE ABLE TO GIVE. TO START SOMEONE IN A JOB TO HELP OUT HIS OR HER FAMILY IN A AREA WHICH NEEDS HELP MAKES MY HEART LARGER THAN LIFE. TO GIVE IS TO RECIEVE,
lenders.occupational_info: I BECAME DISABLED IN 2000 AFTER WORKING 30 YEARS AS A CARDIOVASCULAR TECHNOLGIST. THIS JOB IS DOING TESTING ON PEOPLES HEARTS TO SEE IF THEY NEED  MEDICINE OR SURGERY OR IF THERE HEART IS DOING WELL AT THE TIME OF TESTING. I LOVED MY JOB AND WAS SAD I COULD NOT WORK ANY LONGER. NOW MY TIME IS SPENT WATCHING MY GRANDAUGHTER WHO WAS BORN IN NOV 2006. IT IS A BLESSING FROM GOD TO BE ABLE TO CARE FOR HER.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher. I help young people learn to think.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a school teacher of severely handicapped children who are  3, 4 and 5 years old.

lenders.name: Cindy

lenders.occupational_info: I'm graduating from college and am unsure of what I can do for my life's work.

lenders.name: Michelle & Girls

lenders.occupational_info: I think raising the next generation is one of the most important jobs in the world!

lenders.name: Keri

lenders.name: L&D
lenders.loan_because:
"You may give a piece of bread to a hungry person, and when the cravings of hunger return some one else must administer to his wants again; to put that person in a position to earn his own subsistence is true charity; in this way you direct his feet in the path of true independence, he is then only dependent on his own exertions and on the blessings of his God."
..............................Daniel H. Wells (1814 - 1891)

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: a very small loan creates such a disproportional benefit to small businesses

lenders.name: Kimberly

"Life's most persistent and urgent question is, What are you doing for others?'" - Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.

I want to help those who want to better their lives for themselves and their families, especially those in Latin America and Mexico. Having lived in Mexico, I have a better understanding of some of the financial issues that people are faced with and I want to do what I can to help.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I am so lucky to live in Canada.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to succeed.

lenders.name: James

lenders.loan_because: It's good job!

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: it is remarkable what a difference we all can make.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the entertainment industry.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves is a good thing. Happy to have this opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I design print materials and web sites.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of women in countries that they have to struggle so much on a day by day basis.  I am a "host mother" to a wonderful young man from the Congo that came to this country to attend Davidson College in NC and he has changed my life and made me so much more aware of how fortunate I am because I live in the US.
lenders.occupational_info: Working for a small start-up company that puts up exterior decorative grille work on commerical buidlings.

lenders.name: Rod
lenders.loan_because: We all have dreams, and who wouldn't like a little help towards one? And with a nudge and a wink,  I can also (thanks to Kiva) claim to be a venture capitalist with a highly diversified global investment portfolio.

lenders.name: Lourdes
lenders.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home and take care of my family.  I used to work as a speech therapist.  I helped improve the speech of people who had had strokes, head injuries as well as children with develpmental difficulties.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of small scale face-to-face contact between peoples...that our small contribution can make a huge impact on someone's life...that the loan can have a ripple effect as the money gets loaned over and over..that it's a loan and not charity
lenders.occupational_info: I try, in my own small way, to make an impact on people's lives one person at a time.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I've traveled the world extensively and have seen so much need.  I know a little can mean a lot to someone who wants to make their life better.

lenders.name: Sooze
lenders.loan_because: It's  important to support the contributions people are making to seek change within their lives and the lives of people in their communities
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an environment that fosters peace and allows people to take time to pause.  I am happy serving clients and making their lives less stressful

lenders.name: Dominic & Sooze
lenders.loan_because: It is our desire to foster the entrepreneurial spirit of people in developing countries. We who have more should give to those whom have less.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: we all need help from each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 2nd grade children in Brooklyn, New York City.  They are 7 and 8 years old.  I teach them about reading, writing, math, history, science, and caring for each other.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the world. I am a mother and a teacher and I am grateful to have so much abundance in my own life, I hope to help others reach their hopes, dreams, and life goals too.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college students about urban environmental issues.

lenders.name: Jason

lenders.name: Margaret

Moreover, the act of giving is such a good feeling...better than any gift I could  ever receive.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a commercial cleaning company.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: It is one way to give to those I dont know in the world, because maybe one day I will be the one needing help as well. I wish everyone good fortune in their endeavors.

lenders.name: Chatterjee Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe, and the world is a very small place - we all need to do what we can to make it better for each other.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to have great lives and careers.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: I want others who are not as fortunate, to realize there dreams and provide for their families.  We are all on this earth to help one another, and not fight against each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a Gastroenterology Group. These Doctors help people with stomach issues. My job is to bill insurances and follow-up on payments for the Doctors. Sometimes stressful and sometimes rewarding.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I have been a small businessman all my life.  Business has been very good to me. I want people from all around the world to reap the benefits of entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I cook and sell barbequed pork, chicken, and ribs.  I have a trailer that I pull to fairs and festivals, where I sell my food.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I'm one of the lucky ones.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because:
My son and myself feel fortunate to live in a country 
where all our basic needs have  been met. 
We want to show our gratitude.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint vivid landscapes and sculpt passionate sculpture.

lenders.name: Garrigan Family
lenders.loan_because: We should.

lenders.name: Kelsey
lenders.loan_because: I want everyone to have the opportunity to improve their situation.
lenders.occupational_info: I research point of care diagnositc devices to aid in disease detection in developing countries.

lenders.name: shunmugam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.I've seen hundreds in that position.
lenders.occupational_info: I study general subjects .my goal is to become a dentist.

lenders.name: Ryuichi
lenders.loan_because:
I think that a chance should be equally given to all people.
The compensation to work should be equal to all people.

lenders.name: Rhonda
lenders.loan_because: I to had to get a loan to start my business, 22 years ago.  I had to co-sign with my husband, due to my lack of credit.  Now I'm a successful business women.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach skin care and glamour, with the wonderful Mary Kay products.  When you have taught  a women how to but on a beautiful face, she feels prettier and it raises her self confidence.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: It is important for all people to have a chance to succeed.  I know what it is like to struggle and feel blessed to be in a position to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer/Technology Consultant

lenders.name: daniel
lenders.loan_because: i start a compancy with no nomey and was able to get a loan. this is my 5 years

lenders.name: Jill and Gabe
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to see that other entrepreneurs are given the opportunites that we have always been so fortunate to have.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a husband and wife team. We own and manage several companies including a real estate company that builds homes, a restaurant and a bar and a start-up consumer products company.

lenders.name: Caleb
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want to give the best of what I have to those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Worship Pastor at a church that is focused on serving those in need.

lenders.name: PRISCILLA
lenders.loan_because: TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN SOMEONE'S LIFE. I BELIEVE WE ARE PUT ON THIS EARTH TO HELP EACH OTHER.  I AM BLESSED TO BE IN A POSITION TO HELP SOMEONE.....*TOGETHER WE CAN ALL MAKE A DIFFERENCE*

lenders.name: Kamran Khosravi
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy contributing to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others to be successful in their business or what ever they are up to in life.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: it's both the least and most I can do with the gifts I've received.  It's  practicing the sacred tangibly.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to find ways to help people in pain be more comfortable and happier in how they live.

lenders.name: Natalie & Rob
lenders.loan_because: Kiva.org provides a way in which you can have a personal connection and have a direct impact on someone's life, rather than give money to an organization and hope the funds are put to good use.   And because we can, and if everyone that could help did help, the world would truly be a different and better place!
lenders.occupational_info: Natalie - I work at an outdoor theatre in Los Angeles and help put on around 60 concerts per year.   Rob - I design and build websites.

lenders.name: Jeanie
lenders.loan_because: One of the joys of life is to help others realize their dreams.  Many people have helped me in my life and so I am glad to pass the kindness along.

lenders.name: Chip
lenders.loan_because: the policies of the republican party have degraded the world's economies. We must correct this if for only $25 at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find financing to purchase a home of their own. Business has been difficult but we still want to help others.

lenders.name: Kristoffer
lenders.loan_because: I really like the Kiva-idea. I have the money and Kiva has the people who needs it. And not just for food and shelter - no it's to raise the whole circle of life and help these people in need to start a business. It's really rewarding.

lenders.name: maria
lenders.loan_because: There have been many times in my life where I have needed help and someone was always there. Life is "paying it forward..."

lenders.name: Nick and Jen
lenders.loan_because: We are a small business as well.  We know what it is like to need help, and know what it is like to get it.  We would love to be able to help out as well.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both photographers.  And although our business may be in a very competitive field, we are able to be successful at doing something we both truly love.  We want to help others feel the same way.

lenders.name: www.rap4.com
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: Real Action Paintball, Inc.

lenders.name: Albert
lenders.loan_because: People caring for and helping other people will make for a better world. People need to start thinking about others, and not just themselves. Do unto others what you would like done unto you.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small business called EXPRESS DELIVERY, and what I do is deliver furniture for people who buy at the stores which I have arangememts with to do their deliveries. Not every customer needs or wants delivery, but a lot do and it is convienient for them when they cannot bring the furniture home themselves. I operate just one truck and do the moving myself with one other person.

lenders.name: Doug B
lenders.loan_because: I wasted hundreds of dollars "donating" money to a church (LDS, Mormon). So many better options to give money. I urge everyone to stop giving to their church as well.

lenders.name: nancy
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: i help patients and their families cope with terminal illness.

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: Making the world a better place is something we're going to have to take into our own hands.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a real estate agent in Southern California.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Canadian living in Mexico..

lenders.name: Cherri
lenders.loan_because: I want to help small business owners succeed since that is who I primarily work with through my business (SNAP).
lenders.occupational_info: I help market small businesses through social networking, advertising and promotion.

lenders.name: Clay and Emily
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us so that we can be a blessing to others
lenders.occupational_info: Clay is the principal of a school and Emily is a teacher and a writer.

lenders.name: Hans
lenders.loan_because:
I  think, giving people the "seed finance" (or expansion finance) to develop their own life-base and financing their own financial sources is something most essential to support - it´s surely better to help people getting a machine or other source for their personal financial existance than just feeding! 
Plus: "just a loan" (not a gift in categories of "alm") allows people to keep their face and pride 
Plus: I appreciate the direct relation, to see, that the money reaches the people, and is not withdrawn by administratives as often...
lenders.occupational_info: Yacht charter rental agent for pleasure boats and create webmarketing strategies for small businesses

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I am a fourth generation woman business owner. I understand the plight of women who need to provide for their families as my great grandmother, grandmother and mother have done in their homeland. I as a fourth generation business owner would like to hep support business owners achieve their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I own an online retail store that sells fashion designerwear, fragrances, jewelry, home decor, computer and electronics.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: I always look for ways to give financially that can truly make a long term difference. The only way to true wealth is through entrepreneural enterprise. To encourage young entrepreneurs is to sow the seeds for generational wealth. It is the only real way to effectively bring an end to poverty.

lenders.name: Gillian
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone in the world deserves an opportunity to be a success in this life.  I've been given an amazing opportunity in my own life and want to put that kindness back into the world.  On February 24th 2008 my close friend and room mate left this world in a tragic accident.  Her giving and loving spirit is what she will always be remembered for.  So now I donate in her name so that she will always be remembered for the amazing person she was, and today in spirit she is still saving lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a single parent, raising my seven year old with out a father, is still much of a social taboo.  I work as a personal trainer and group fitness exercise instructor.  I help people get healthy and meet their own physical goals.  It's a blessing to save lives both on-line and off. :)

lenders.name: judy
lenders.loan_because: because I know how hard it is not to have the money to make a business work......
lenders.occupational_info: I am a hairdresser....

lenders.name: Shyanne
lenders.loan_because: lending is more empowering others rather than just giving money!!

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life who really needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help rehabilitate cardiac patients after surgery.  I also teach martial arts and self defense to kids and adults.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: I have seen first hand the poverty in developing nations and there is no better way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Managed Futures, International Finance, Alternative Investments, hedge Fund consulting, private capital

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Lin
lenders.loan_because: Although I, too, struggle, I have many blessings that others do not.  My focus is on Uganda having travelled there for three weeks in August 2007.  I've never been so touched by such kind, friendly, and polite people with the biggest smiles in the whole wide word.  Although they don't have much, they don't complain and so I want to be a part of making their lives just a little bit better and providing them with a future.  I was impressed by the country, the wildlife, the people, and the children who would occasionally ask for a mere pencil.  Imagine American kids appreciating a pencil?!
lenders.occupational_info: The job that almost pays the bills is for a private bank in Boston supporting one of its Partners; but I also volunteer at the Boston zoo as a zookeeper and am passionate about gorillas -- we have 7.  It was a thrill to sit amongst wild Mt. Gorillas in Bwindi; and I was also touched by my 18 year old porter who I've stayed in touch with and also sponsored his college education.  Hopefully on my return trip, he will be my Driver/Guide as he's studying Tourism.

lenders.name: John Elton
lenders.loan_because: By the Grace of God I am able to loan, and I like to see people make a better life for themselves, their families and their communities.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: This funding fosters self-sufficiency enabling people to provide for themselves,  their families, and communities.  I would like to some day own my own pharmacy, but I also have funding difficulties.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in under served communities, in small independent pharmacies.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.occupational_info: I own and operate a small internet retail business.

lenders.name: Two Palms
lenders.loan_because: We're lucky and fortunate; we want to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info:
He = Volunteering at the hospital, sitting on the beach, by the pool, or blogging on the Internet.

She = Sitting on the beach or helping Seniors live a better life.

lenders.name: cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in growing the lives of women in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with large healthcare organizations to develop strategies to improve business.

lenders.name: Roberto
lenders.loan_because: It empowers people who are willing to make a difference in their lives to rise above poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I build programs for computers

lenders.name: Magali
lenders.loan_because: Helping others in their efforts toward improving their circumstances is the right, and human, thing to do.

lenders.name: Chris & Marisa
lenders.loan_because: a little goes a long way!

lenders.name: Russell & Pamela
lenders.occupational_info: Chiropractic/Acupuncture/Nutrition

lenders.name: Maryam
lenders.loan_because: I want to end poverty.

lenders.name: Manuel
lenders.loan_because: little money makes the difference, thats great.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping and giving...

lenders.name: Rossana
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I am an accountant during the day but love to cook food from all over the world (and eat it) in my free time.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Empowering people to accomplish self made goals is to help, uplift, and succeed while invigorating to both themselves and all around them.  Success of any type is contagious to all around.  That is the best way to re-invent the spirit of giving to others.
lenders.occupational_info: Assisting others around the world to be able to communicate thru computers on a day-to-day basis.

lenders.name: Giovanni
lenders.loan_because: I am human. I see other humans as a part of myself.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is involved with cartoon animation for children. I believe that children need bread as much as they need joy and dreams.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: This is a cool idea.  I have heard of it but now with the power of online banking it can be done so easily.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an information technology manager and I believe that lowcost open source computing can transform the world.

lenders.name: sherwood
lenders.loan_because: I load because i love to help children and people to helf themself too.
lenders.occupational_info: I work making houses for my country Barbados in the west Indies.

lenders.name: Masud
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to have some money to spare.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: money is always in transition. It comes and goes. Usually goes out more than what comes back! But today I'm lucky enough to have some to share. Tomorrow who knows!?
lenders.occupational_info: I help students get funding to pay for their education, and ultimately achieve their dreams. Of utmost importance is to provide someone with the tools to become self-sufficient, and in turn, help others. Always.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone has the potential to achieve their personal dream as long as resources are available to make it a reality.
lenders.occupational_info: Finding solutions to the basic human needs-food, shelter and community.

lenders.name: PATSY
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.  Give someone a helping hand.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to not have any where to turn. My heart and prayers go out to each and ever one of these wonderful people. I love you all.

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs for someone to be the action of their hope.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to make the world a better place and sometimes I make movies.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It simply makes sense to share good fortune.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I am greatful to live in a country that values the family system and younger generations of humanity. I feel blessed to make a living by teaching children through play and creative exploration.  I would love to pass on some of that freedom of life to those in search of it. 
I believe that providing the opportunity to create local enterprise and satisfy local needs is one of the best ways to strengthen society, help people to escape poverty, and bring real progress and development.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with developmentaly delayed young children. I teach their parents to understand why their child is doing the "funny" things they don't understand and help them turn these "strange" behaviors into productive teaching moments and real connections between parent and child. These real connections enhance the relationship and shared loving experience and then the child grows and learns from this shared and special moment.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: i want my Children to see that 1 person really can effect an entire community
lenders.occupational_info: I sell steel, aluminum ,copper ,brass etc. to people all over the world

lenders.name: Miha
lenders.loan_because: I like to see how small amounts of money get wisely spent and can make a change on the other side of the world...

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I believe that systemic poverty is the harshest tragedy facing our generation.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead a company that measures and scores the quality of workplaces.

lenders.name: Ivette
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my blessings
lenders.occupational_info: I work in my house and my garden ,I am retired.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: People need my help.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach in a program that deals largely with  low income students who have been in trouble at school.

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a college student.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: i can.
lenders.occupational_info: i provide government support to children and families in need.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed..., Pay it forward...
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur...  I match opportunity with people...

lenders.name: Rob & Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed and grateful to be able to share with others.

lenders.name: Mindy
lenders.loan_because: I can be the change I want to see in the world.

lenders.name: Ilene
lenders.loan_because: It helps people remain independent
lenders.occupational_info: I run the computer game company, Snood

lenders.name: KELLY
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I care.  We are all children of God.

lenders.name: Angie & Brian
lenders.loan_because: trying to love my neighbor as myself...
lenders.occupational_info: I work on airplanes

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the potential to have a more direct impact on someone's life.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: The more people that are uplifted from poverty, the more people can contribute towards the Singularity.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: Purely selfish reason - there is no better feeling than helping those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work out of my home as an independent contractor doing medical transcription.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Marketplace commerce is the only way to empower individuals, financially and otherwise, worldwide. I want to be a part of that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in oil and gas transactions, and natural resource, energy and environmental law.

lenders.name: vital
lenders.loan_because: I think is a nice way to help someone
lenders.occupational_info: I do remodeling fixing peoples houses

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: When people can work they can take care of their family.  People are all the same, they want to take care of those they love.  I have been so lucky.
lenders.occupational_info: I help design advertising to sell products.

lenders.name: Craig and Sue
lenders.loan_because: God tells us to take care of the poor
lenders.occupational_info: We take care of seniors who can't live alone, and take care of themselves.  A companionship relationship.  Taking them to Dr. appointments, etc.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people you want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I install computer systems so that large businesses can process their business information easily between 1000's of people working at the business.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Chadwick
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.  My wife is from an under privilidged country and we want to do everything that we can to help people change their economic standing.
lenders.occupational_info: We work reselling items via internet (on ebay).

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of helping someone to have a better life. I know what it is like to struggle and now that I'm in a better position to help, I find it humbling to be able to make a difference in families lives all across the world.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I believe that helping others is key not only to the survival of the world but also to my inner peace.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I believe microfinance is a powerful tool to alleviate world poverty
lenders.occupational_info: Studying to become a lawyer

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: Its feels good to help someone less fortunate then me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a residential Realtor in South Florida and also have a home based travel business.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I believe microlending is the best way to help people in poverty

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I admire anyone who works hard for a better quality of life.

lenders.name: Marey
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people better their lives.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: of Love ;0)

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: when giving is a priority, the world runs better.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a center that provides educational services to children who struggle in school.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach many subjects in a small rural high school: Current World Problems and Solutions, French, and English.

lenders.name: GDP upgrade
lenders.loan_because: Its luck that we weren't born in their conditions.

lenders.name: Myka
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much (for someone who lives in the SF Bay Area) and I've always wanted to find a way to help people. This was something I could do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the person behind the person everyone knows.

lenders.name: Eve
lenders.loan_because: This first loan is in honor of my dear friend Margie, who always tried to make the world a better place.  Future loans to express my thankfulness for all I have been given in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help identify health issues and problems in the U.S., especially among minority populations. I hope my work will contribute to ultimately improving their health and quality of life.

lenders.name: Miss Molly Bell
lenders.loan_because: I have a special place in my heart for people taking risks in order to start a business.  Everyone has something to offer and the simplest event can take off!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am part time professional actress on the stage, part time voice and dance teacher and full time mom.  I have also just starting writing a new musical!

lenders.name: Quenten
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate in my life and I want to spread the fortune!
lenders.occupational_info: I organize conventions and meetings for a large hotel chain

lenders.name: Nic
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 6 year old kid who wants to help others.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: there is no better feeling in the world than to be able to help others less fortunate and see them succeed.  I have seen first hand how dedicated and hard working these individuals are and all they need is a little funding to help them become self-sufficient.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to have abundance in my life and I want to share as much as I can with others. I think Kiva is a brilliant idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Public Health for the US government. I spend my days trying to prevent or at least lessen disease throughout the world.

lenders.name: Aimee
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people that want to help themselves.  I want to teach my daughters the joy of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I help attorneys and their clients prepare their cases to present to a court.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe growing economies help keep regions stable, preventing violence.  And I believe in international compassion.  And really, I just believe in entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I figure out new ways to discover pharmaceuticals

lenders.name: Joey
lenders.loan_because: There is so much need in this world.  I hope to help individuals make a better life for themselves and their families.  I want to share some of the many blessings God has given me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large medical lab where I help primary care doctors better understand the causes of their patients' birth defects, infertility or cancer.
